remarks: A bijection from the divisors of a prime power to the integers less than the prime count.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)
statement:
dvdsppwf1o.f $e |- F = ( n e. ( 0 ... A ) |-> ( P ^ n ) ) $.
dvdsppwf1o $p |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN0 ) -> F : ( 0 ... A ) -1-1-onto-> { x e. NN | x || ( P ^ A ) } ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d P n x $.
